cause.description:
To topple the corrupt and evil regime of Kim Jong Il and to liberate the people of North Korea and free their minds from the tyranical propaganda that holds them. And to unite South Korea and North Korea as one sovereign nation.
1. Overthrow Kim Jong Il
2. Free North Korea
3. Unite North and South Korea
cause.mission: To free North Korea from oppression
cause.name: Liberate North Korea
